mapper.sql: id, username, phone, password, nickname, email, avatar, dept_id, status, deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select from sys_user where username = #{username} and deleted = 0

select u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.email, u.phone, u.avatar, u.dept_id, u.status, u.create_time, u.update_time, array_to_string(ARRAY_AGG( distinct r.role_name), ',') as role_names, array_to_string(ARRAY_AGG( distinct r.role_code), ',') as role_codes from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id and ur.deleted = 0 left join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id and r.deleted = 0 where u.deleted = 0 and u.username like concat('%', #{username}, '%') and u.status = #{status} and u.email like concat('%', #{email}, '%') and u.phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%') and u.dept_id = #{deptId} group by u.id
SELECT r.* FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.deleted = 0
